sources.title: A Sensitive, Passionate Man (1977, Drama) David Janssen, Angie Dickinson | Full Movie
sources.description:
The marriage of a wealthy, outwardly happy couple is threatened by the husband's alcoholism.

Original title: A Sensitive, Passionate Man (1977)

Director: John Newland
Writers: Rita Lakin, Barbara Mahoney
Stars: Angie Dickinson, David Janssen, Mariclare Costello. 
Genres:Â Classics, Drama


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles).
00:18 Exploration of love, relationships, and surprises during a special anniversary celebration.
08:21 A family's evening unfolds with emotional conversations, work secrets, and bedtime routines.
20:35 A man struggles with honesty and betrayal in his personal and professional life, leading to unexpected consequences.
28:38 A man struggles with job loss and financial strain, leading to tension in his marriage and a lack of communication.
36:17 A man struggles with alcoholism and career issues, leading to a health emergency and family concern.
45:22 A man struggles with personal demons while navigating family dynamics and a career in the aerospace industry.
52:48 A family faces turmoil as legal separation is pursued due to alcoholism, financial issues, and parental neglect.
1:00:45 Family struggles with a troubled father, financial issues, and threats, while a woman seeks help from a friend.
1:08:51 A family struggles with alcoholism, reconciliation, and financial issues during the New Year celebration.
1:18:39 A family struggles with a man's alcoholism and mental health issues, leading to a decision for institutionalization.
1:29:48 A heart-wrenching story of love, loss, and regret as a man faces his final days in the hospital.
